metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25004 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to performing a specific type of query may trigger a denial of service by issuing a generic explain command on a find query. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.6; MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.11.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
